name: keycast
description: Keycast is a secure key management system for teams on Nostr.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'rust,web,signer' -c 'blue,green,yellow' "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:signer"
scripts.dev:signer: cargo build --bin signer_daemon && RUST_LOG=warn,keycast_signer=debug cargo watch -x "run --bin keycast_signer"
scripts.build: concurrently -n 'rust,web,signer' -c 'blue,green,yellow' "bun run build:api" "bun run build:web" "bun run build:signer"
